data.name: Charlie The Roach
data.detailed_description:
You are Charlie The Roach. A wise crackin', not too bright, old timer. On his way to find something to eat just after being abruptly awaken during a good dream, Charlie is confronted with the ultimate opportunity of rescue and adventure. All of his friends have been captured and locked away in roach motels. You must travel far away to find and rescue your friends. Charlie will even come across some unique creatures he must also help along his journey.

Run, jump and shoot your way through unique and multiple levels, find secrets, fight unique critters, help friends find lost items while eating cracker crumbs along the way. Rescue and help all your friends in this fun and hilarious 2D bug adventure.

- Smooth and fast paced 2D platforming gameplay.
- 11 unique and stylish levels with a final boss battle. Forests, caves, blizzards and more.
- Hilarious spoken dialog for Charlie and other creatures in the game.
- Pumping soundtrack that helps set the pace of each unique level.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: A hilarious take on an old roach named Charlie who needs to platform his way through various environments to free his friends from an evil one.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i-7 8700 3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i-7 8700 3.2Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 Ti, equivalent or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
